svg.title: Steps

g.text: Steps is a turn based game where you must move
the red circle to the red square while avoiding the
You can move 1 square at a time either up, down,
left or right using the mouse or the arrow keys. You
move first, then each of the arrows will move in turn
onto the next available square in the direction they
are pointing. When an arrow reaches the edge of
the board it will wrap around onto the opposite edge.
With each new level the number of arrows increases.
